definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: And, DNA testing suggests that the food animals themselves were the major source of contamination.
sentences.chinese: DNA測試表明食用動物本身就是主要污染源。

sentences.english: Preliminary tests indicate the substance found was Ricin.
sentences.chinese: 初步測試表明，該物質是蓖麻毒素。

sentences.english: Testing has shown increased speed improvements of 5X to 10X.
sentences.chinese: 測試表明，轉換速度提高了5到10倍。

sentences.english: By test, it has been confirmed that these varnishes possessed good properties and could be used as amino coatings.
sentences.chinese: 性能測試表明，該類烘漆確實具有較優異的性能。

sentences.english: The silicone -acrylic emulsion paint for exterior wall has been proved to be excellent through performance test.
sentences.chinese: 性能測試表明，硅丙外牆乳膠漆的性能優異。

sentences.english: The average velocity of droplet swarm is muchdiffrent from that of a single drop.
sentences.chinese: 測試表明液滴羣的浮升速度同單液滴有顯著不同。

sentences.english: It showed that the patient was producing a huge amount of growth hormone.
sentences.chinese: 測試表明該患者體內分泌大量生長激素。

sentences.english: Government tests show that it emits virtually no dioxin and other pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 政府測試表明該廠幾乎沒有二噁英及其他污染物排放。

sentences.english: None of the tests found the cement to be stable.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一次測試表明水泥是穩定的。
